definitions.definition: To beat with a rapid succession of strokes.
examples: The ruffed grouse drums with his wings.

definitions.definition: To drill or review in an attempt to establish memorization .
examples: He’s still trying to drum Spanish verb conjugations into my head.

definitions.definition: To go about, as a drummer does, to gather recruits, to draw or secure partisans, customers, etc.; used with for .
Of various animals, to make a vocalisation or mechanical sound that resembles drumming.

secondary_definitions: ( ambitransitive ) To beat with a rapid succession of strokes.
( transitive ) To drill or review in an attempt to establish memorization .
To go about, as a drummer does, to gather recruits, to draw or secure partisans, customers, etc.; used with for .
Of various animals, to make a vocalisation or mechanical sound that resembles drumming.
